title: Which post will you get after GPSC? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are so many jobs available after GPSC. If you go for GPSC Class 1 Examination than you may become applicable for administrative posts like Deputy CollectorDeputy Supredenant of Police(DySP)Assistant Commissioner Of State taxDistrict Registrar etc…If you go for GPSC Class 2 Examination than you may become applicable for middle management posts like Mamlatdar2. Section Officer 3. Taluka Development Officer etc…

GPSC exam includes many different types of Class 1 and 2 post. You can check link GPSC Gpsc also conduct exam for super class 3 post like Deputy Section Officer and Depty Mamalatdar , State Tax Inspector.
